summary: Adds a Clam Farm to Lake Ilinalta.
descriptionHtml:
Clam Farm

Ever find it odd that you can just pick a farmers crops and sell them yourself without them caring? Neither have I, and now you can do it with Clams!
A familly of Argonian Clam Ranchers have moved to skyrim, and built their home on the north shore of Lake Ilinalta at the mouth of the white river. 

This mod adds a new location as well as three new NPC\'s
There are no quests as of yet, and I have only implemented basic packaging. 

The Clam Farm can be found just west of the three \'sign stones\' (before Riverwood)

INSTALLATION
extract files to a temporary location then drag and drop the ClamFarm.esp into your Skyrim Data folder.

Dont forget to check out the Pearl Farm mod for Oblivion that started it all!
author: Kyman3
